headline: Packaging Corporation Of America Faces Margin Strain And Demand Uncertainty
summary: Packaging Corporation of America (NYSE:PKG) is contending with declining operating margin alongside weaker return on invested capital. Unit volume growth is lagging, pointing to softer demand for the company’s packaging products. The combination of margin compression, weaker ROIC, and subdued volume growth highlights operational and profitability pressures that go beyond short term fluctuations. Packaging Corporation of America is a major producer of containerboard and corrugated packaging,...
